macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: SEC Updates Broker-Dealer Rules to Include Stablecoins with 2% Haircut
items.summary: The SEC now permits stablecoins like USDC and USDT in broker-dealer capital calculations with a 2% haircut, boosting institutional DeFi participation. This enhances access to crypto markets for regulated entities.

items.title: CFTC Signals Imminent US Crypto Market Structure Legislation
items.summary: CFTC Chairman states a new U.S. crypto market structure bill is close to becoming law, promising regulatory clarity and stability for digital assets.

items.title: Russian Central Bank to Allow Foreign Crypto Exchanges via Subsidiaries
items.summary: New regulatory bill classifies digital currencies and stablecoins as 'monetary value,' permitting foreign exchanges to operate locally through subsidiaries while restricting payment use.

items.title: Bitcoin Consolidates Near $68K Amid Extreme Fear and Bearish Signals
items.summary: Bitcoin hovers around $68K with Fear & Greed Index at 8, showing head-and-shoulders pattern, supply clusters at $66.8K, rising leverage, and five weeks of ETF outflows signaling potential deeper correction.

items.title: Morpho Token Surges 13% on Institutional Demand
items.summary: Morpho rises 13% amid lifting institutional demand in crypto markets, with no major token unlocks scheduled for February 21.

items.title: Kite (KITE) Surges 18% Leading AI Tokens
items.summary: KITE climbs 18% to $0.27 with $202M trading volume, outperforming other AI cryptos despite sector slump.

items.title: $300 Million USDC Transfer Between Unknown Wallets
items.summary: A large $300 million USDC movement occurs between unidentified wallets, indicating significant capital flows in the ecosystem.

items.title: SXP, ALLO, and ESP Lead Market Gains with 25-34% Surges
items.summary: Major cryptocurrencies trend higher, with outperformers SXP up 34%, ALLO 25%, and ESP 25%.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Generative AI Outperforms Human Research Teams in Medical Data Analysis
items.summary: UC San Francisco and Wayne State University researchers found that generative AI can process massive medical datasets faster than traditional teams, with some AI systems producing stronger predictive models for preterm birth. A junior research pair using AI tools generated functioning code in minutes—work that would normally take experienced programmers hours or days.

items.title: Study Reveals Large Language Models Learn Through 'Surprisingly Short Programs'
items.summary: Researchers from Mila Quebec AI Institute and McGill University present evidence supporting the superficial alignment hypothesis, suggesting pre-trained AI models contain vast knowledge and subsequent training primarily unlocks existing capabilities rather than learning entirely new skills.

items.title: Edge AI in Smart Grids Market Surges to $19.46 Billion in 2026
items.summary: The edge artificial intelligence market for smart grids is projected to grow from $15.49 billion in 2025 to $19.46 billion in 2026, with a 25.7% compound annual growth rate driven by renewable energy integration, grid efficiency demands, and IoT deployment.

items.title: EC-Council Launches Four New AI Certifications Amid Workforce Skills Gap
items.summary: EC-Council unveiled four AI certifications and Certified CISO v4 to address a 700,000-person AI and cybersecurity reskilling gap in the U.S., as organizations move AI from pilot projects into everyday operations with $5.5 trillion in global AI risk exposure.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Microsoft Names AI Executive Asha Sharma as New Xbox CEO, Phil Spencer Retires
items.summary: Microsoft has appointed Asha Sharma, an AI executive and former Instacart COO, as the new head of its gaming division, replacing retiring Xbox leader Phil Spencer amid slowing growth, layoffs, and a strategic refocus on consoles. Sarah Bond is also departing, with Matt Booty promoted to chief content officer.

items.title: Phil Spencer Retires as Microsoft Overhauls Xbox Leadership
items.summary: Xbox boss Phil Spencer is retiring as Microsoft shakes up its gaming unit, with Asha Sharma taking over as head of Microsoft Gaming and Matt Booty becoming executive VP of content, amid revenue declines and competition challenges.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Amazon Overtakes Walmart as World's Top Sales Company
items.summary: Amazon has surpassed Walmart to become the number one company globally by sales revenue.

items.title: Turner Construction Selected for Meta's $10 Billion Data Center in Indiana
items.summary: Turner Construction Company has been chosen as the contractor for Meta's massive four-million-square-foot data center campus in Lebanon, Indiana, providing 1 gigawatt of capacity.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro Partners with NVIDIA on Gigawatt-Scale AI Factory in India
items.summary: L&T announced a venture under IndiaAI Mission to build sovereign, scalable NVIDIA AI factory infrastructure for enterprises and industrial transformation.

items.title: Energy Technology Coalition Launched for Efficient Data Center Power
items.summary: Schneider Electric and Bloomberg New Economy co-chair the new coalition to enhance energy efficiency, grid management, and integration of clean power for data centers and growing demands.
